where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pd <* USEDIN (SELF, 'ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION') | NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (pdr <* USEDIN (pd, 'ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION') | ('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF (pdr.used_representation)) AND ('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'CSG_2D_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF (pdr.used_representation)))) = 1))) = 0

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (sar <* USEDIN (SELF, 'ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT') | ((sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'mounting surface') AND (sar.related_shape_aspect\shape_aspect.description = 'interconnect module component surface feature')))) = 1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pd <* USEDIN (SELF, 'ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION') | NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (pdr <* USEDIN (pd, 'ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.DEFINITION') | ('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF (pdr.used_representation)) AND (pdr.used_representation\representation.context_of_items\ geometric_representation_context.coordinate_space_dimension = 3) )) = 1))) = 0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (sar <* USEDIN (SELF, 'ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_SHAPE_ASPECT') | ('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'COMPONENT_SHAPE_ASPECT' IN TYPEOF (sar.related_shape_aspect)) AND (sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'mounting surface') AND (sar.related_shape_aspect\shape_aspect.description = 'interconnect module component surface feature'))) = 1

rule.name: component_placement_restriction_assignment_constraint

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | (sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'area impacted group') AND NOT ('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'MOUNTING_RESTRICTION_AREA' IN TYPEOF(sar.related_shape_aspect)) )) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | (sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'area impacted group') AND NOT (('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'GROUP_SHAPE_ASPECT' IN TYPEOF(sar.relating_shape_aspect)) OR (('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT' IN TYPEOF(sar.relating_shape_aspect)) AND ('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'GROUP_PRODUCT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(sar.relating_shape_aspect.of_shape.definition)) AND ('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_CONTEXT' IN TYPEOF(sar.relating_shape_aspect.of_shape.definition.frame_of_reference)) AND (sar.relating_shape_aspect.of_shape.definition.frame_of_reference.name = 'design requirement') )))) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | (sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'volume impacted group') AND NOT ('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'MOUNTING_RESTRICTION_VOLUME' IN TYPEOF(sar.related_shape_aspect)) )) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(sar <* shape_aspect_relationship | (sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'volume impacted group') AND NOT (('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'GROUP_SHAPE_ASPECT' IN TYPEOF(sar.relating_shape_aspect)) OR (('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT' IN TYPEOF(sar.relating_shape_aspect)) AND ('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'GROUP_PRODUCT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(sar.relating_shape_aspect.of_shape.definition)) AND ('ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_PLACEMENT_REQUIREMENTS_MIM.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_CONTEXT' IN TYPEOF(sar.relating_shape_aspect.of_shape.definition.frame_of_reference)) AND (sar.relating_shape_aspect.of_shape.definition.frame_of_reference.name = 'design requirement') )))) = 0
